com.skobbler.ngx.map
Interface SKMapSurfaceListener

public interface SKMapSurfaceListener

Listener for map surface events.

Version:
2.5

Method Detail

onActionPan

void onActionPan()
Notifies when an action on map is done. This method is notified on the UI thread.

onActionZoom

void onActionZoom()
Notifies when a zoom is done. This method is notified on the UI thread.

onSurfaceCreated

void onSurfaceCreated(SKMapViewHolder mapViewHolder)
Notifies when the map surface is created or recreated. This will happen after the activity is resumed. IMPORTANT : Methods to the SKMapSurfaceView should be called only after this notification not after inflating the view. .This method is notified on the UI thread.

Parameters:
mapViewHolder - the view that holds the map view

onMapRegionChanged

void onMapRegionChanged(SKCoordinateRegion mapVisibleRegion)
Notifies when the map region was changed. This method is called whenever the currently displayed map region changes. During panning/zooming, this method may be called many times to report updates to the map position. Therefore, your implementation of this method should be as lightweight as possible to avoid affecting performance. This method is notified on the UI thread.

Parameters:
mapVisibleRegion - - new map center

onMapRegionChangeStarted

void onMapRegionChangeStarted(SKCoordinateRegion mapRegion)
Notifies when the region of the map will begin changing. During one panning/zooming, this method is called once, at the beginning. This method is notified on the UI thread.

Parameters:
mapRegion - the current visible map region.

onMapRegionChangeEnded

void onMapRegionChangeEnded(SKCoordinateRegion mapRegion)
Notifies when the region of the map finished changing. During one panning/zooming, this method is called once, at the end. This method is notified on the UI thread.

Parameters:
mapRegion - the final visible map region.

onDoubleTap

void onDoubleTap(SKScreenPoint point)
Notifies when a double tap was done. This method is notified on the UI thread.

Parameters:
point - point where double tap was done.

onSingleTap

void onSingleTap(SKScreenPoint point)
Notifies when a single tap was made. This method is notified on the UI thread.

Parameters:
point - point where the single tap was done.

onRotateMap

void onRotateMap()
Notifies when the map was rotated. This method is notified on the UI thread.

onLongPress

void onLongPress(SKScreenPoint point)
Notifies when a long press was done. This method is notified on the UI thread.

Parameters:
point - point where the long press was done.

onInternetConnectionNeeded

void onInternetConnectionNeeded()
Notifies when map tiles need to be downloaded, but this can't be done because the library mode is set to offline.

onMapActionDown

void onMapActionDown(SKScreenPoint point)
Notifies when a pressed gesture has started. This method is notified on the UI thread.

Parameters:
point - point where the gesture has started.

onMapActionUp

void onMapActionUp(SKScreenPoint point)
Notifies when a pressed gesture has finished. This method is notified on the UI thread.

Parameters:
point - point where the gesture has ended.

onPOIClusterSelected

void onPOIClusterSelected(SKPOICluster poiCluster)
Notifies when a cluster was tapped. This method is notified on the UI thread.

Parameters:
poiCluster -

onMapPOISelected

void onMapPOISelected(SKMapPOI mapPOI)
Notifies when a map POI was tapped on the map. This method is notified on the UI thread.

Parameters:
mapPOI -

void onAnnotationSelected(SKAnnotation annotation)
Notifies when an annotation was tapped on the map. This method is notified on the UI thread.

Parameters:
annotation -

void onCustomPOISelected(SKMapCustomPOI customPoi)
Notifies when a custom POI was tapped on the map.This method is notified on the UI thread.

onCompassSelected

void onCompassSelected()
Notifies when the compass was tapped. This method is notified on the UI thread.

onCurrentPositionSelected

void onCurrentPositionSelected()
Notifies when the current position is selected. This method is notified on the UI thread.

onObjectSelected

void onObjectSelected(int objectId)
Notifies when an object (polygon or polyline) that was previously drawn on the map is selected. This method is notified on the UI thread.

Parameters:
objectId - the id of the selected object (polygon or polyline)

onInternationalisationCalled

void onInternationalisationCalled(int result)
Notifies when the set internationalisation method was called. This method is notified on the UI thread.

Parameters:
result - the result of the method:
0 - failed
1 - success
2- option not supported by the current map installed

onBoundingBoxImageRendered

void onBoundingBoxImageRendered(int requestId)
Notifies when a request to render a map region to a file has been completed. This method is notified on the UI thread.

onGLInitializationError

void onGLInitializationError(java.lang.String errorMessage)
Notifies that the gl surface could not be initialized

Parameters:
errorMessage -
